title: Boku no Hero Academia
alternative_title: My Hero Academia, 僕のヒーローアカデミア
description: Midoriya Izuku was just a regular middle school student in a world where people with superpowers known as Quirks are the norm. However, he dreams of one day becoming a Hero, despite being bullied by his classmates for not having a Quirk. After being the only one to try and save his childhood friend, Katsuki, from a Villain, All Might, the world's greatest Hero, bestows upon him his own quirk, One For All. The story follows Izuku's entrance into Yuuei High School, a school that cultivates the next generation of Heroes.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
